Uri

this class represents an uri http://host:port/path/id

Summary
Urithis class represents an uri http://host:port/path/id
Functions
appendPathappend a path to the current URI
setBaseUrlset the base url for this uri a base url is something of the form http://host:port
appendIdadd an id to the current uri
addParamadd params to the uri
toStringget a string representation for the uri
GeoStore.ContentProviderthis class abstract away GeoStore APIs
Functions
initializeinitialize this class
beforeFindthis method is called before find methods
afterFindthis method is called after find methods
beforeSavethis method is called before save or update methods
afterSavethis method is called after save or update methods
successset a callback method for success
failureset a callback method for failure
findByPkfind an element by its primary key in async mode
findfind all elements in async mode
updateupdate an element identified by its pk
deletedelete an element by its primary key in async mode
createcreate a new element in async mode

Parameters

setBaseUrl

Uri.prototype.setBaseUrl = function(baseUrl)

set the base url for this uri a base url is something of the form http://host:port

Parameters

baseUrl{String} Return: {Uri}

Parameters

id{String or Number} Return: {Uri}

Uri.prototype.addParam = function(name,
value)

add params to the uri

Parameters

name{String} the name of the param
value{String or Boolean or Number} the value of the param Return: {Uri}

Parameters

Return: {String}
